title: Triangular silver nanoprism-based chemosensor for recognition of hyaluronic acid in human biofluids: a new platform for monitoring osteoarthritis treatment using smartphone-assisted digital image analysis

Hyaluronic acid (HA) possesses unique viscoelastic properties and low immunogenicity, making it suitable for various biomedical purposes such as viscosupplementation in osteoarthritis treatment, assistance in eye surgery, and wound regeneration.
